attributes.action: say why he is so much against devolution for england other than losing the sottish votes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England will soon be the only country in UK which is controlled by the other three and therefore we should be put on an even playing field so that we can control our own destiny.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
